channel.title: Project-Regret [Delta] Remaking!
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Hello MoparScape I'm Here Today to show you my Server Development, I know how most of you, Well let me rephrase, How much all of you hate delta, But i'm posting this because i do enjoy Delta very much, Anyway after i finish this i will not have time to code anymore, I'm working on this new project with RippiinFtW, Anyway back to my topic, I will Show my current updates, and updates i will add in the future, got a giant latin test tomorrow, So no i wil not update anything today. Before we go on thanks for reading this.[/size] _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [size=8pt]Key: Done Started Haven't Started[/size]
New Donator Zone D-Claws, 4 hit Spec. Flawless combatt (Almost Finished) GS Specs Adding XP Lamps For Donators (Might take out later on) Adding all new Home/Skills Added ::funpk Added Working Sled Took out alot of un-needed commands & Junk. Added I Pannel. Added Pk Skulls. Making players be able to cook all raw Food. Adding Random Events Making Chatfilter (If The server catches a server IP Being said, OR anything along the lines of that. You will Three Warnings, and Auto Banned) [size=8pt]I will add more updates as i think of them, Not all pictures will be shown below, But they deffinatley will be all their tomorrow.[/size]
When you log-In: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/o926mb.jpg[/img]
Right before you open Bank: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/ak7ce9.jpg[/img]
Enter Bank Pin: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/23sc9c.jpg[/img]
Donator Island: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/9q92iw.jpg[/img]
Fishing: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/b81cfo.jpg[/img]
I am Aware i don't have all the pics. I will post all that i have, and i will take more tomorrow Don't Fret :)

item.title: Project-Regret [Delta] Remaking!
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“JokesOnYou, post:13, topic:412670”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=514148.msg3732207#msg3732207 date=1314673212]

[quote author=JokesOnYou link=topic=514148.msg3731857#msg3731857 date=1314666465]

So maybe eventually More people will start using Delta again… You know?

Not a good thing…
[/quote]Always going to have haters -.-

Stop using hater, it’s a stupid term. Delta is messy and pretty shitty, it’s not something we want more people using.
[/quote]your opinionn so take it and shove it in ur ass bitch[/quote]
A bit immature?

The bank pin does not work 100% because the number locations in the buttons are not correctly randomized. I also think this is a fairly pointless project to say the most. A wise person once said, “Sometimes it’s easier to recreate something than to fix it.”

Read full topic

Not a good thing…

hes not hating, delta is just messy… also adding d claws to a 317 isnt a good idea and using commands is a lazy way to do stuff - also id like the see a vid of your perfect combat, good luck

[/quote]I’ll believe it when I see it.

And a suggestion, get a new donator zone location, that one is waaay over used and is on every other server…[/quote]

item.title: Project-Regret [Delta] Remaking!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:412670”][quote author=JokesOnYou link=topic=514148.msg3731757#msg3731757 date=1314663941]

You come back after quitting about a day ago?
[/quote]I quit my Rs-Remake, I found this delta i was editing a while back when i couldn’t do alot. Now that i can actually code i feel like this is a perfect base for beginners. And the reason why i quit my Rs-Remake 06 is because i realised everyone was doing that same project. I will eventually go back to it. Right now im just trying to Code delta alot better then it is now. So maybe eventually More people will start using Delta again… You know?

Yes, at least a little bit more explanation was given unlike others just quitting. And so I’ll support this development and hope for the best.

Good luck mate.[/quote]Thanks for supporting me, it means alot.

Read full topic

[size=10pt]Hello MoparScape I’m Here Today to show you my Server Development, I know how most of you, Well let me rephrase, How much all of you hate delta, But i’m posting this because i do enjoy Delta very much, Anyway after i finish this i will not have time to code anymore, I’m working on this new project with RippiinFtW, Anyway back to my topic, I will Show my current updates, and updates i will add in the future, got a giant latin test tomorrow, So no i wil not update anything today. Before we go on thanks for reading this.[/size]

[size=8pt]Key:
Done
Started
Haven’t Started[/size]

New Donator Zone
D-Claws, 4 hit Spec.
Flawless combatt (Almost Finished)
GS Specs
Adding XP Lamps For Donators (Might take out later on)
Adding all new Home/Skills
Added ::funpk
Added Working Sled
Took out alot of un-needed commands & Junk.
Added I Pannel.
Added Pk Skulls.
Making players be able to cook all raw Food.
Adding Random Events
Making Chatfilter (If The server catches a server IP Being said, OR anything along the lines of that. You will Three Warnings, and Auto Banned)
[size=8pt]I will add more updates as i think of them, Not all pictures will be shown below, But they deffinatley will be all their tomorrow.[/size]
